ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We are continuing our activities in full swing. During the last year our main objective of Drama Training and Drama workshop under leader ship of sri Dwijen Bandopadhyay.our production â€œGUNADHARER ASUKHâ€ continued in full swing. During this year many new members have joined us to make the organization a healthy and successful one. Besides completing successful production of MUSTIYOG, SUNDAR, TUSHAGNI, NAGARIK, we have also produced another Drama by name, GUNADHARER ASUKH by Dramatist Sri Pradyut Chakraborty. The famous light man who has earned very good reputation in Bengali Group Theatre Sri Badal Das, was also associated with this production. Great Director & Director as well as chairman of our SAMSTAB Drama organization Sri Dwijen Bandopadhyay is the director of our drama GUNADHARER ASUKH. It is needless to mention here that the GUNADHARER ASUKH have earned acclamation from Audience as well as Theatre Class of Kolkata and West Bengal. Jyotisman Chattopadhyayâ€™s â€œNAGARIKâ€ and Mohit Chattopadhyayâ€™s â€œTUSHAGNIâ€ come next, with newest and ideas. After â€œTUSHAGNIâ€ our next venture is â€œGUNODHARER ASUKHâ€ written by Pradyut Chakraborty. It has already been accepted by the audience very much. â€œGUNODHARER ASUKHâ€ got three Awards as token of recognition. Dwijen Bandyopadhyay received Ujjal Sengupta Smriti Purashkar as best actor for his Portrayal of Gundohar. Swapana Sandhari presented Shyamal Sen Smriti Samman as the best production. Dramatis Pradyut Chakraborty received Satyen Mitra Smriti Purashkar presented by Theatre Workshop as the best playwright. Some of the chippingâ€™s of the reviews are being enclosed herewith. Our Next and latest venture is â€œEI GHUMâ€ written by Sri Mohit Chattopadhyay. The stage was designed by eminet director Sri Bibhas Chakroborty. Music was composed by Sri Murari Roy Chowdhury . Light designed by Sri Badal Das. Directed by Sri Dwijen Bandopadhyay.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Sandarbha was established on 13th September 1977. It is very difficult to exist for continue 38 years and struggle against all opposition. It was the dark days of emergency period when we started our journey with the Drama of Kabiguru Rabindranath Tagore. Sandarbha has, of course, drawn the attention of the dramatic world in the year 1998 under the leadership of Dr. Soumitra Basu. From 1998 to 2009 Sandarbha has produced the dramas â€“ Jajatio, Bijorito, Murkir Handi, Shani Mangal, Godier Khonje, Jeevan Japan, Padotika, Patan Diner Gaan, Gahvar, Tuntuni Lo, Aparahata, America Abishkar, Bidushok, Big Bazar and Mangoler Katha, Nirbas. Offlet Sandarbha has become one of the superior theatre groups of Kolkata by its remarkable successful productions. Our performances have been staged on various renowned auditoriums in and outside of Kolkata. Apart from Kolkata (West Bengal), we have performed in Bhopal, Indore, Pune, Chandigarh and Delhi. Besides the productions Sandarbha attemps to perform some other works that express its social awareness. We conducted several educative and cultural lectures and seminars based on theatre and on different social aspects. We also perticipated in walks and rallies against AIDS and War. We performed several street plays to encourage the campaign against social abuses. Sandarbhaâ€™s production have been very popular and have earned awards like Paschim Banga Natya Akademi Puraskar, Jyotsna Makha Smriti Puraskar, Sayak Puraskar, Prerana Puraskar and Sottyen Mitra Smriti Puraskar etc.

ngoList.title: Santi Tuberculosis Control Society
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Santi TB is reputed NGO establisehd in the period of 1982. It is a pioneer institute in South 24 Pargnas(s) WestBengal in the field of Tuberculosis control and prevention programme. We have a received a plot from Govt. of WB measuring 1.73 acres through the late Rev Motehr Teresa MC. We organised training and orientation programme for the Village health Practioners, ICDS workers and community leaders as well as DOT providers. we are the members of Stop TB Partnership. We were the members District TB Control Society and State TB Control Society in West bengal. We have complete diagnostic infrastructure like pathology and Radiology. We provide free treatment facilities. We are recognised PHI in South 24 Parganas district. We are recognised DMC ( District Microscopic centre) We worked TB Control Programme under KMC ( Kolkata Municipal Corporation) with the kind support of CARE India. Our sputum conversion rate is remarkable and cure rate more or less 90%.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The one and only Buddhist Organization in Birbhum District in the State of West Bengal working for preservation and restoration of Buddhist Culture and Art by propagation of Buddhism for the sake of mankind. Mission s Present Religious and Cultural Activities: 1. Provide free residual facility for students of Higher Buddhist Studies at Viswabharati University, Santiniketan. 2. Provide free Atish Dipankar Library for students and all other local residents. 3. Organize of Vippassana Meditation Camp. 4. Organize of Traditional Buddhist Occasions through out the year. The organization is also working for social up liftment of tribal, poor and distressed people at its jurisdiction by organizing various social welfare activities through out the year. Mission s Present Social Welfare Activities : 1.Running of Sabitri Pal Charitable Dispensary to provide Medical facilities by free Medical Check up and free Distribution of Medicines by the eminent Doctors of Kolkata and abroad. 2. Running of Bhabananda Sweing Training Centre to provide self employment. 3.Distribution of clothings and other basic amenities amongst the local tribal, poor and distressed people through out the year. Mission s forthcoming dream projects: 1. Construction of Bhikkhu(Monk), Bhikkhuni(Nun) Training Centre to establish the Organization as a Centre of Excellence for Buddhist Culture and Art. 2. Construction of Old Aged Home. 3. Construction of a 10 Bedded Hospital for Women and Child.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: AS REGARD TO ACHIEVEMENT OF OUR SOCIETY,WE HAVE AIMED AT ALL ROUND DEVELOPMENT OF THE PEOPLE ARROUND THE SOCIETY AS WELL AS MAXIMUM BENEFIT OF THE WEAKER SECTION OF THE SOCIETY INCLUDING ST,SC.AND OBC COMMUNITY. FOR THIS PURPOSE WE HAVE STARTED A MOBILE LIBRARY.A VAN LOADED WITH VARIETY OF BOOKS MOVES VILLAGE TO VILLAGE PROVIDING BOOKS TO THE INTERESTED READERS.SECONDLY THE NIGHT SCHOOLS ARE SETUP FOR ADULT EDUCATION AS WELL AS CHILDREN TO DRIVE ILLITERACY FROM THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES. THIRDLY A PLAN FOR AN IDEAL VILLAGE PROGRAMME IS TAKEN TO PUT IN ACTION THE SWACHACHA BHARAT ABHIJAN.SOME ENTHUSIASTIV YOUTHS OF THE VILLAGE ON THE HOLIDAY COME OUT OF THEIR HOUES WITH BASKET,BROOMS AND BLEACHING POWDER TO KEEP LOCALITY CLEAN.FOURTHLY WE ENCOURAGE THE THE YOUTHS FOR JOBORIENTATION BY ADOPTING SELF EMPLOYMENT.SOME SELF HELP GROUP WORKERS HAVE BEEN WORKING IS THE DIFFERENT FIELD OF SELF EMPLOYMENT ACTIVITIES .LASTLY WE HAVE TRAINED THE FARMER FOR THE RURAL AREA TO USE BIOFERTILIZER IN THE FIELD TO KEEP THE PRODUCTIVITY OF THE SOIL.FOR THIS PURPOSE,WE HAVE BEEN HELDING MEETING WITH THEM. TO SUM UP OUR ACHIEVEMENTS WE ARE TRYING TO MAKE THIS N.G.O A PLATFORM BETWEEN GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC TO PROVIDE THEM ALL SORT OF DEVELOPMENTAL WORK OF THE GOVERNMENT TO THE PUBLIC AND TO PROVIDE THEM BEST SERVICES FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT AS A MEDIUM OF IMPLEMENTATION OF THE PEOPLE

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Shelter for Her Empowerment is formed by a group of professional, qualified social workers. They have keen interest in social work and they are committed to uplift women. They had understood gender inequality in society. Though legal system is trying hard to introduce various legal provisions to eradicate woes of women, yet women themselves do not know about the legal weapons they have for their safeguard. Shelter for Her Empowerment detect that awareness is power. The very name of the society refers that it is for the strength and power of women. Therefore, the society aims to educate the women and instil knowledge in to them. SHE is earnest in educating the women. The veteran teachers are toiling hard for that purpose. Slum girls and all the girls of under privilege class of society are being regularly taught. More than two hundred girls have attended our classes. English, Mathematics, Bengali and History taught. We take special care to prepare girls for career oriented course. We trained them in English conversation, computer. It has developed their communication skill. This skill is so successfully developed that already some girls have got jobs. Our girls already had trained the Potuas of Midnapore in spoken English. With the help of SHE girls, a section of Potuas are communicating in English with foreigner customers and therefore their business has shot up. SHE has assisted Girls to take up nursing training. These girls are already in employment. SHE has been performing street theatres for last five years in various places including interior slums and district. Street drama is a medium to reach out the folk in the easiest way. Our theaters deal with the social vices and their legal riddance. Dowry system, 498A, Bigamy, Female foetcide, Minor marriage etc. are few examples. Our street theatres are easily understandable, full of fun and are readily acceptable. Marginalized SHE girls are performing in the drama. Reality in their family gets expression in theatrical acts. A girl, victim of bigamy, acts in the drama. It is interesting. SHE is hugely keen to spread awareness in women. Knowledge is power. Under the influence of our street theatres, the poverty struck and socially handicapped women folk wake up to resist social vices. They protested to dowry or to surrender to social injustices and are ready to snatch their rights. We have a long list of alike case history. SHE is also a legal counseling centre. It looks after family, properly and marital problem. We have handled approximately 129 cases. On 19th March 2012 SHE has successfully organised a programme on Tagoreâ€™s Short Stories-a search for gender equality through a combination of lectures, drama, dance and song performance at Madhusudan Manch for the target audience of about 350 mostly women. The programme was highly appreciated by print and TV media. This programme was sponsored by govt. of India under TCGS to commemorate 150 years of Tagore.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: There are millions of children in our country who doesnt have access to adequate clothing. In rural areas kids doesnt get enough clothes during winter which causes fever and cold, sometimes death. Slums are also heavily affected in winter season, and lack of warm clothes made things worst for them. Paridhan means Vastra in Sanskrit which in English is clothing. We started distributing clothes among slum kids since 2015.

ngoList.title: SHILPI SANGHA HOWRAH
ngoList.actName: Registration of Societies West Bengal Act XXVI of 1961
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Shilpi Sangha (Howrah) was conceptualized and formed as a Group Theatre in the year 1999 and got registration on 12 June 2000 under West Bengal Society Registration Act, 1961 with certain objectives which are as stated below :- â€¢ To study and demonstrate the art of drama. â€¢ To focus social scenario of Indian society by dint of drama and to try bringing awareness among the people of certain sections of the society. â€¢ To come forward to alleviate sick, helpless and indigent students and persons afflicted with serious illness, natural calamities like flood, cyclone (like Aiyala) etc. Shilpi Sangha (Howrah) is a cluster of art-loving people from various parts and sections of our society to develop a good group theatre for social and cultural growth. From the beginning this organization composed new Dramas almost every year and staged in different districts of West Bengal. Those dramas are the replica of social scenario. In most of our performances, we received huge applause and encouragement from different levels of people. We won several prizes and appreciations in number of competition shows. Above all we could achieve in penetrating into the mind of general people through our performances. As for our humanitarian activities, we may mention that on several occasions we came out with our meagre means to help poor heart patient for medical treatment, flood-stricken people, Aiyala-affected villagers, donation to needy student, organizations like Ramakrishna Mission etc. Shilpi Sangha (Howrah) has performed the following dramas till the year 2009 : 1. Sajano Bagan 2. Narak Gulzar 3. Gulsan 4. Kamala Nihata 5. Chhuti 6. Tritio Purush 7. Ak Nadite 8. Dena Paona Above all, Shilpi Sangha (Howrah) believes in heart that theatre can build up better cultural ambience in the society.
